Name: Vertex Dispenser
About the game: Vertex Dispenser is an abstract real-time strategy game with mathematical puzzle elements. Move around a geometric surface and lay claim to your territory. Protect it by capturing solid faces for defense. Manipulate the colours of your vertices to gain power for special abilities. Balance your time between attacking, defending, expanding and colouring to survive and defeat your enemies. Key Features: Single-player campaign mode Single-player puzzle mode Team-based multi-player Cross-platform multi-player - Play with both your PC and Mac friends
